original_title: The Departure of the Second Contingent for the Boer War
overview: New Zealand's oldest surviving film shows a troop of horsemen from the Boer War Second Contingent in camp at one of the open days held before their departure at Newtown Park, Wellington, likely 13 January 1900. (https://ngataonga.org.nz/)
title: The Departure of the Second Contingent for the Boer War
